meanings.sent1: She wore comfortable bhangs while exploring the market.
meanings.sent2: The traditional attire included colorful bhangs.
meanings.sent3: His bhangs were so big, he almost tripped over them!
meanings.sent4: In the breeze, her bhangs billowed like sails on a ship.
meanings.sent5: The image of the flowing bhangs stayed in her mind long after the festival.
